snippet: With less than three weeks before the first voting round, President Nicolas Sarkozy and his Socialist rival, François Hollande, raised sharp accusations about one another.
abstract: French presidential election begins to heat up weeks before first round of voting, as Pres Nicolas Sarkozy and his Socialist rival Francois Hollande outline their programs for the country and raise sharp accusations about one another.
lead_paragraph: With less than three weeks before the first voting round, President Nicolas Sarkozy and his Socialist rival, François Hollande, raised sharp accusations about one another.

headline.seo: Sarkozy and Presidential Rivals Trade Attacks
headline.main: Sarkozy and His Rivals Trade Attacks as Vote Nears
headline.print_headline: Sarkozy and His Rivals Trade Attacks as Vote Nears
